t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect and Build Your Brand in the UK
s: Amazon Brand Registry is a programme designed to protect your intellectual property, offering sellers an exclusive set of brand benefit tools. Explore them now!
January 2, 2018 - Amazon has developed a brand policy dedicated to its platform. Its objective is to protect the brands of its sellers from counterfeiting.
The Alexa brand’s primary color is Alexa Blue.

Since I set up my brand registry as “Acme Pencils,” I’m going to have to sell my new brand of office chairs under the same name. I want to totally change markets and start selling clothes? Yup, they have to be sold under Acme Pencils. It can’t be changed once you set it up.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.
